title: 1Password 7.0.3 Build 70003001 (Trial)
content: 1Password is a straightforward and streamlined software solution designed to provide all the required tools to store, generate and access your passwords from within a user-friendly interface or directly from your favorite web browser.   User-friendly and intuitive password manager   From 1Password’s main window you can manage all your passwords, notes and credit card information, generate strong unique passwords and fill registration forms using your data. All your info is stored in a secure personal vault that is protected by a password that you’ll have to remember.    By using 1Password, you can improve your productivity and increase your security level using unique passwords for all your accounts.    The best part is that you don’t have to remember them, 1Password will provide the required password and login information every time you need it.   Browser integration using add-ons   Thanks to 1Password’s browser extensions you have instant access to all your data directly from within the currently used browser. 1Password provides extensions for Apple’s Safari , Mozilla Firefox , Google Chrome and Opera .    Consequently, you can open the desired webpage and login with a single click of a mouse button. 1Password is capable to automatically submit the require information for you and even save new Logins as you create new accounts.   Strong password generator with advanced synchronization feature   Furthermore, 1Password helps you create and save incredibly strong passwords for your favorite sites, applications and services. All passwords are randomly generated following your instructions and stored by 1Password in order to be reused when you need them.    On top of that, the 1Password utility enables you to synchronize your data across multiple devices using iCloud, Dropbox or locally over Wi-Fi networks.    All in all, 1Password is a powerful and multi-platform software that offers an OS X and Windows version for the desktop, an iOS version for your iPhone, iPad and iPod touch, as well as a mobile version for your Android devices.    Hence, with the help of 1Password, you will have constant access to all your sensitive data, regardless of the device you decide to use.    Password manager  Fill form  Generate password  Password  Fill  Form  Encryption
